00032 #include "lib/sensors.h"
00033 #include "dev/rs232.h"
00034 #include "dev/serial-line.h"
00035 #include "lib/simEnvChange.h"
00036 #include <string.h>
00037 #include <stdio.h>
00038 
00039 const struct simInterface rs232_interface;
00040 
00041 #define SERIAL_BUF_SIZE 1024
00042 
00043 // COOJA variables
00044 char simSerialReceivingData[SERIAL_BUF_SIZE];
00045 int simSerialReceivingLength;
00046 char simSerialReceivingFlag;
00047 
00048 static int (* input_handler)(unsigned char) = NULL;
00049 
00050 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 void rs232_init(void) { }
00052 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 void rs232_set_speed(unsigned char speed) { }
00054 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 void
00056 rs232_set_input(int (*f)(unsigned char))
00057 {
00058   input_handler = f;
00059 }
00060 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 void rs232_send(char c) {
00062   printf("%c", c);
00063 }
00064 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00065 void
00066 rs232_print(char *message)
00067 {
00068   printf("%s", message);
00069 }
00070 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00071 void
00072 slip_arch_writeb(unsigned char c)
00073 {
00074   simlog_char(c);
00075 }
00076 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00077 static void
00078 doInterfaceActionsBeforeTick(void)
00079 {
00080   int i;
00081 
00082   if (!simSerialReceivingFlag) {
00083     return;
00084   }
00085 
00086   if (simSerialReceivingLength == 0) {
00087     /* Error, should not be zero */
00088     simSerialReceivingFlag = 0;
00089     return;
00090   }
00091 
00092   /* Notify specified rs232 handler */
00093   if(input_handler != NULL) {
00094     for (i=0; i < simSerialReceivingLength; i++) {
00095       input_handler(simSerialReceivingData[i]);
00096     }
00097   } else {
00098     /* Notify serial process */
00099     for (i=0; i < simSerialReceivingLength; i++) {
00100       serial_line_input_byte(simSerialReceivingData[i]);
00101     }
00102     serial_line_input_byte(0x0a);
00103   }
00104 
00105   simSerialReceivingLength = 0;
00106   simSerialReceivingFlag = 0;
00107 }
00108 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00109 static void
00110 doInterfaceActionsAfterTick(void)
00111 {
00112 }
00113 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00114 
00115 SIM_INTERFACE(rs232_interface,
00116               doInterfaceActionsBeforeTick,
00117               doInterfaceActionsAfterTick);
